Demo:

```{r}
library(distancer)
library(ggplot2)
df <- do_simulation_r(
  max_genetic_distance = 1,
  mutation_rate = 0.1,
  n_generations = 1000000,
  n_loci = 4,
  population_size = 10,
  rng_seed= 42
)
qplot(ts, ns, data = df, geom = "line")
```
